Node.Title: My name at Microsoft.com for the first time
Node.Description: In the every-week .NET community highlights, my post about [creating links in MVC](http://www.neptuo.com/blog/2016/10/24/mvc-route-values) was mentioned.

Node.Title: Starting with Timeline web design
Node.Description: Well, the initial tought was to display all my work, projects and life milestones as a stream of events. So I have started with this Timeline.
Started blogging at [neptuo/blog](http://www.neptuo.com/blog). It is a technology blog with based on experiences.
I have finished my Master's degree at CTU in Prague, Open Informatics, Software Engineering. My master's thesis was [Template Engine](http://www.neptuo.com/project/cms/templateengine).
I have created an account on [GitHub.com](https://github.com/maraf) and moved all my open sources from private SVN to public GIT.

After an awsome semester with guys from Seznam.cz I have finished my [Pisqorks](https://github.com/maraf/Pisqorks) project for [A0M33KAJ](http://opensource.seznam.cz/CVUT/A0M33KAJ/). It is a full javascript and web sockets tic-tac-toe game.
I have registered a domain [neptuo.com](www.neptuo.com). From this day it is my internet home.

I have finished my Bachelor's degree at CTU in Prague, Faculty of Electronics, Software Engineering. My bachelor's thesis was [Web Operating System](http://www.neptuo.com/cms/webdesk). --------------------------------------- It is a desktop-like web application, implemented in Java EE and [GWT](http://www.gwtproject.org), running on Glassfish. I have implemented users management and remote file system. --------------------------------------- However I have never continued on development after definding the thesis, because I have switched to the .NET environment.
I have started on my first open-source project [WindowsDock](http://www.neptuo.com/project/desktop/windowsdock). I missed it in Windows, had much of spare time and so, decided to code it, using WPF.

My first touches in .NET and Windows Forms at CTU. This was a turning point in my dev life. I had many experiences with PHP and learned a lot of theory about Enterprise Java. But .NET, from this day, I used it for nearly everything (with HTML, CSS and Javascript)...
Started as a freelancer coding HTML, CSS and Javascript.
After implementing some simple CMS based on application requirements, I tought that something more reusable is needed and started with [is4wfw](http://www.neptuo.com/cms/is4wfw).
My first day at CTU in Prague, Faculty of Electronics, Software Engineering.
